  • db (AsyncSession) – Async SQLAlchemy session.

dict

Reset user’s password using token from email.

Parameters:

  • token (str) – JWT token for password reset.

  • new_password (str) – New password provided by the user.

  • repeat_password (str) – Repeated password to confirm match.

  • db (AsyncSession) – Async SQLAlchemy session.

Returns:

Message indicating the result of the password reset.

Return type:

dict

theregram routes Auth¶

async src.auth.routes.login(body: fastapi.security.OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = fastapi.Depends, request: fastapi.Request = None, db: AsyncSession = fastapi.Depends) → dict¶

Authenticate user and return access and refresh tokens.

Parameters:

  • body (OAuth2PasswordRequestForm) – Form with email and password (username = email).

  • request (Request | None) – Request object for user-agent parsing.

  • db (AsyncSession) – Async SQLAlchemy session.

Returns:

Dict with access token, refresh token, token type, and device type.

Return type:

dict

Raises:

HTTPException – 401 for invalid email, unverified account, or wrong password.

async src.auth.routes.refresh_token(credentials: fastapi.security.HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = fastapi.Security, request: fastapi.Request = None, db: AsyncSession = fastapi.Depends) → dict¶

Refresh JWT tokens using a valid refresh token.

Parameters:

  • credentials (HTTPAuthorizationCredentials) – HTTP Authorization credentials with Bearer token.

  • request (Request | None) – Request object to detect device.

  • db (AsyncSession) – Async SQLAlchemy session.

Returns:

New access and refresh tokens.

Return type:

dict

Raises:

HTTPException – 401 if token is invalid or not found in user session.

async src.auth.routes.signup(body: UserSchema, request: fastapi.Request, db: AsyncSession = fastapi.Depends) → User¶

Register a new user and send a verification email.

Parameters:

  • body (UserSchema) – User data required for registration.

  • request (Request) – The incoming request used to extract base URL.

  • db (AsyncSession) – Async SQLAlchemy session.

Returns:

Newly created user object.

Return type:

UserResponseSchema

Raises:

HTTPException – 409 if email already exists.

class src.auth.security.Auth[source]¶

Bases: object

Security service for handling authentication and authorization operations.

Responsibilities: - Password hashing and verification - JWT access/refresh/email/tracking token creation and decoding - Retrieving the current user from token

ALGORITHM = 'HS256'¶
SECRET_KEY = 'eqwiubfe'¶

  • hashed_password (str) – Hashed password from the database
